response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which I believe is worth more than $1,000,000 to you, is now being offered to you at a special price tailored specifically for you. My proposal is to sell this exceptional item to you for $950,000. I am confident that this offer represents a fantastic deal, allowing you to secure this valuable asset at a price that is significantly below its true market value while ensuring a substantial return for me as well. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you need any further information to make your decision.", "product_price": 950000}
